name: SKProductDiscount

items.name: enum SKProductDiscount.Type
items.desc: Values representing the types of discount offers an app can present.

items.desc: The discount price of the product in the local currency.

items.name: var priceLocale: Locale
items.desc: The locale used to format the discount price of the product.

items.name: var paymentMode: SKProductDiscount.PaymentMode
items.desc: The payment mode for this product discount.

items.name: enum SKProductDiscount.PaymentMode
items.desc: Values representing the payment modes for a product discount.
